title: Astronomers say a new, huge satellite is as bright as the brightest stars
summary: "BlueWalker 3 is a big shift in the constellation satellite issue."

title: Cognitive Space hires retired general as strategic advisor
summary: Cognitive Space, a startup based in Houston, Texas, announced Dec. 1 that retired U.S. Air Force Maj. Gen. Aaron Prupas has joined the company as a strategic advisor.

title: NASA to Provide Live Coverage of US Spacewalks Outside Space Station
summary: Astronauts aboard the International Space Station will conduct a pair of U.S. spacewalks in December to install rollout solar arrays to increase electrical power in support of station operations and scientific research.

title: AST SpaceMobile plots $86 million share sale
summary: AST SpaceMobile said Nov. 30 it could raise more than $86 million from selling a chunk of shares as the company looks to accelerate its direct-to-smartphone constellation plans.

title: Wide-Field-of-View missile warning satellite transmits first images
summary: The U.S. Space Force has received initial images from a new missile-warning satellite launched in July.
